# multi: Morphometric UtiLiTIes

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

> **Warning**
> This package is under active development. The API may change.

multi (Morphometric UtiLiTIes) provides utility functions that make basic steps &mdash; cleaning street networks, creating spatial units, etc. &mdash; in urban morphometric analyses easier.

## Installation

You can install the development version of multi from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("anirudhgovind/multi")
```
